assignments.description: Adds the employment snapshot to the collection variable that'll be inserted later.
assignments.name: Add_employment_snapshot
assignments.label: Add employment snapshot

assignments.description: Adds the financial product snapshot to the collection variable that'll be inserted later.
assignments.name: Add_financial_product_snapshot
assignments.label: Add financial product snapshot

assignments.description: Adds the gains/ISAs/losses snapshot to the collection variable that'll be inserted later.
assignments.name: Add_gains_ISAs_losses_snapshot
assignments.label: Add gains/ISAs/losses snapshot

assignments.description: Clear the employment snapshot variable so all values are blank for the next iteration.
assignments.name: Clear_employment_snapshot_variable
assignments.label: Clear employment snapshot variable

assignments.description: Clear the financial product snapshot variable so all values are blank for the next iteration.
assignments.name: Clear_financial_product_variable
assignments.label: Clear financial product variable

assignments.description: Clear the gains/ISAs/losses snapshot variable so all values are blank for the next iteration.
assignments.name: Clear_gains_ISAs_losses_snapshot_variable
assignments.label: Clear gains/ISAs/losses snapshot variable

assignments.description: Sets the values of the financial product snapshot to equal the values of the financial product in this flow loop.
assignments.name: Create_financial_product_snapshot
assignments.label: Create financial product snapshot

decisions.description: Checks if any employment records are associated with this household.
decisions.name: Any_employment_records
decisions.label: Any employment records?

decisions.description: Checks if any financial products are associated with this household.
decisions.name: Any_financial_products
decisions.label: Any financial products?

decisions.description: Checks if any gains/ISAs/losses records are associated with this household.
decisions.name: Any_gains_ISAs_losses_records
decisions.label: Any gains/ISAs/losses records?

Flow.description: This flow creates an FF session record with a record type of snapshot. It then links to this FF records across the various other objects. The purpose of this solution is to take a point in time snapshot of the household's financial situation. This is taken when we provide advice so we have this view for compliance reasons - e.g. could present it if we are audited.

formulas.description: Maps the employment record type to an FF employment record type.
formulas.name: employment_record_type_mapping

formulas.description: Maps the financial product record type to an FF financial product record type.
formulas.name: financial_product_record_type_mapping

Flow.label: Snapshot | Capture

loops.description: Loops through all of the employment records related to the household.
loops.name: Loop_employment_records
loops.label: Loop employment records

loops.description: Loops through all of the financial product records related to the household.
loops.name: Loop_financial_products
loops.label: Loop financial products

loops.description: Loops through all of the gains/ISAs/losses records related to the household.
loops.name: Loop_gains_ISAs_losses_records
loops.label: Loop gains/ISAs/losses records

recordCreates.description: Insert the employment snapshots for this household that were created in the loop earlier.
recordCreates.name: Insert_employment_snapshots
recordCreates.label: Insert employment snapshots

recordCreates.description: Insert the financial product snapshots for this household that were created in the loop earlier.
recordCreates.name: Insert_financial_product_snapshots
recordCreates.label: Insert financial product snapshots

recordCreates.description: Insert the gains/ISAs/losses snapshots for this household that were created in the loop earlier.
recordCreates.name: Insert_gains_ISAs_losses_snapshots
recordCreates.label: Insert gains/ISAs/losses snapshots

recordLookups.description: Gets the employment records for this household.
recordLookups.name: Get_employment_records
recordLookups.label: Get employment records

recordLookups.description: Gets the financial products records for this household.
recordLookups.name: Get_financial_products
recordLookups.label: Get financial products

recordLookups.description: Gets the gains/ISAs/losses records for this household.
recordLookups.name: Get_gains_ISAs_losses_records
recordLookups.label: Get gains/ISAs/losses records

recordLookups.description: Get the details of the household.
recordLookups.name: Get_household
recordLookups.label: Get household

variables.description: Stores the account snapshots to be created in this flow for household and person accounts.
variables.name: account_snapshots

variables.description: Stores details of an individual asset snapshot. Used to temporarily hold values in the asset loop.
variables.name: asset_snapshot

variables.description: This variable stores the FF asset records that need to be created as a snapshot in this flow.
variables.name: asset_snapshots

variables.description: Stores details of an individual employment snapshot. Used to temporarily hold values in the employment loop.
variables.name: employment_snapshot

variables.description: This variable stores the FF employment records that need to be created as a snapshot in this flow.
variables.name: employment_snapshots

variables.description: Stores details of an individual financial product snapshot. Used to temporarily hold values in the financial product loop.
variables.name: financial_product_snapshot

variables.description: This variable stores the FF financial product records that need to be created as a snapshot in this flow.
variables.name: financial_product_snapshots

variables.description: Stores details of an individual gains/ISAs/losses snapshot. Used to temporarily hold values in the loop.
variables.name: gains_isas_losses_snapshot

variables.description: This variable stores the FF gains/ISAs/losses records that need to be created as a snapshot in this flow.
variables.name: gains_isas_losses_snapshots

variables.description: Stores details of a household snapshot. Used to temporarily hold values in the account loop
variables.name: household_snapshot

variables.description: Stores details of an individual liability snapshot. Used to temporarily hold values in the liability loop.
variables.name: liability_snapshot

variables.description: This variable stores the FF liability records that need to be created as a snapshot in this flow.
variables.name: liability_snapshots

variables.description: Stores details of a person account snapshot. Used to temporarily hold values in the account loop
variables.name: person_account_snapshot
